name: Rock Lounge/Bar
text:
Offering handcrafted drinks and lively entertainment, the Rock Lounge, located in Split Rock Resort's Galleria, is the perfect way to spend the evening. Relax after a day of outdoor activities, enjoy a nightcap, or catch one of our entertainers.

  • Monday - Thursday:
    4-11PM
    Friday & Saturday:
    12PM-12AM
    Sunday:
    12PM-11PM
  • (570) 722-9111
  • Entertainment Schedule:
    3/5 Group Du Jour Trio
    3/12 Tom and Clarence Duo
    3/19 Dirty Robots
    3/26 Long Time Comin’
